abstract: Exelon‘s board of directors approved a plan to buy back as much as $1.5 billion of the company’s common stock, the utility company said Thursday.
lead_paragraph: Exelon‘s board of directors approved a plan to buy back as much as $1.5 billion of the company’s common stock, the utility company said Thursday.

headline.main: Exelon to Buy Back Up to $1.5 Billion Shares
